typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		InvoiceID as integer,
		VendorID as integer,
		InvoiceNumber as string,
		InvoiceDate as date,
		InvoiceTotal as float,
		PaymentTotal as float,
		CreditTotal as float,
		TermsID as string,
		InvoiceDueDate as date,
		PaymentDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ReadInvoicesTable
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ReadVendorsTable
ReadInvoicesTable, ReadVendorsTable join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinInvoicesVendors
